parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the backup vault. The description must be 0 to 255 characters in length.

parameters.name: EncryptType
parameters.description:
The method that is used to encrypt the source data. This parameter is valid only if you set the VaultType parameter to STANDARD or OTS_BACKUP. Valid values:

*   **HBR_PRIVATE**: The source data is encrypted by using the built-in encryption method of Hybrid Backup Recovery (HBR).
*   **KMS**: The source data is encrypted by using Key Management Service (KMS).

parameters.name: KmsKeyId
parameters.description: The customer master key (CMK) created in KMS or the alias of the key. This parameter is required only if you set the EncryptType parameter to KMS.

parameters.name: RedundancyType
parameters.description:
The data redundancy type of the backup vault. Valid values:

*   LRS: standard locally redundant storage (LRS). Cloud Backup stores the copies of each object on multiple devices of different facilities in the same zone. This way, Cloud Backup ensures data durability and availability even if hardware failures occur.
*   ZRS: standard zone-redundant storage (ZRS). Cloud Backup uses the multi-zone mechanism to distribute data across three zones within the same region. If a zone fails, the data that is stored in the other two zones is still accessible.

parameters.name: ReplicationSourceRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the source vault resides.

parameters.name: ReplicationSourceVaultId
parameters.description: The ID of the source vault.

parameters.name: VaultName
parameters.description: The name of the backup vault. The name must be 1 to 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: VaultRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the backup vault resides.

parameters.name: VaultStorageClass
parameters.description: The storage type of the backup vault. Valid value: **STANDARD**, which indicates standard storage.
